title: CCC: Cardano Multiversity MVP
description: **CCC will provide meaningful, memorable, motivational learning & skills transference experiences w/measurable results, currently non-existent**

title: Visual DAO Framework
description: DAO simulation & visualization is not accessible.

title: CCC: Reset Ready?|Value-Flow Wealth
description: **"Reset Ready?" Onboard *EVENT* + Highly Incentivized Stake Pool Loyalty Rewards; currently lack DEVELOPER DRIVEN toroidal value-flow.**

title: CCC: Work|Live|Play@MOA
description: **WLP onboard, educate, incubate accelerator reduces effort&friction while compressing time&space between pro-development phases, non-existent**

title: Layer 2 Advanced Architecture
description: Cardano **NEEDS** a cutting edge layer 2 data solution that will handle large volumes of, and high rates of, irregular and complex data.

title: Ranking projects built on cardano
description: Lack of a plateform where investors can find the best projects built on cardano and where the entrepreneurs can go to raise additional funds

title: Africa/Diaspora Dev Tools & Events
description: WADA is rapidly expanding beyond West Africa, in order to sustain and support our growth we need to maintain hosting regular events.

title: Software as a Service for Cardano
description: Developers need to deploy infrastructure to communicate with Cardano. This time-consuming and costly task stops the development of new ideas

title: Incentivized Developer Training
description: Cardano development is hard, with a steep learning curve. The economically disadvantaged cannot easily afford the time and effort.

title: CardanoSharp - UnrealEngine SDK
description: Game Developers using the UnrealEngine game engine do not have easy integrated solutions to support tokens and NFTs in their games.

title: CardanoSharp - Unity SDK
description: Game Developers using the Unity game engine do not have easy integrated solutions to support tokens and NFTs in their games.

title: CardanoSharp - Minting
description: Currently the .NET Library, CardanoSharp, lacks appropriate support for minting tokens.

title: CardanoSharp - Multisig
description: Currently the .NET Library, CardanoSharp, lacks appropriate support for Multisig.

title: A viral onboarding experience
description: No blockchain has a blockbuster onboarding experience. The first to develop a social & viral one will secure majority market share. 🚀

title: 3D-Level editor for game-devs
description: Content creation for level-based games in 3D is very resource and time-consuming. There is no open source modular framework for game devs.

title: Cardano Wallet JS Multisig
description: **cardano-wallet-js** lib should be able to create a multi-sig wallet in order to sign transactions from multiple parties.

title: Mobile App Template For Blockchain
description: Many great projects are inaccessible via native mobile clients. We'd create iOS/iPad and android frontend clients for use by other projects.

title: Rust Cardano Networking Crate
description: Current implementation of Cardano Node provides core infrastructure only in Haskell, which is hard to integrate for many developers.

title: Gravatar for ADA Wallets
description: Hashed public key based wallet addresses are not human-readable and do not offer personalization.

title: Localize Yoroi for Bulgaria
description: Yoroi is currently lacking Bulgarian interface, making in difficult to access for the broader local public.

title: Localize Yoroi for Ukraine
description: Yoroi is currently lacking Ukrainian interface, making in difficult to access for the broader local public.

title: Crowdfunding Website for Start-Ups
description: Catalyst funding treasury is not sufficient to guarantee idea success, project development, and market implementation.

title: Orcfax: trustworthy Cardano oracles
description: Smart contract developers need reliable real-world facts but there are no \*standards-based\* Cardano oracles providing authentic information.

title: Localize Yoroi for Vietnam market
description: Yoroi has not been localized for the Vietnamese language. which leads to many mistakes and difficult use for Vietnamese

title: GameChanger: The onboarding wallet
description: Infrastructure barriers, poor docs, costs, inheritances and user interface complexities are pulling us apart from onboarding newcomers

title: AI App Builder
description: We severely limit the growth, richness and reach of the Cardano platform by building one-size-fits all solutions

title: NFT Payment Option
description: The price of ADA drastically increasing after you purchase a NFT with ADA.

title: Cardano meditation network
description: We need community engagement around meditation practices in order to develop empathy and clarity, which will bring more value in return.

title: African Blockchain Centre for Devs
description:
*   Lack of trained Blockchain developers worldwide
*   Acknowledgment/credibility of African devs
*   African brains trot to the Western countries

title: CardanoSharp Smart Contract Support
description: Currently the .NET Library, CardanoSharp, lacks appropriate support for interacting with smart contracts.

title: CardanoSharp - Interactive Learning
description: It can be intimidating learning how to use and integrate blockchain into applications using the CardanoSharp Library

title: NFT API window
description:
How do you communicate with someone you only know the wallet address of?

One idea is send a note as NFT. What if an NFT was a chat window!!

title: SOLID Software Development Projects
description: Developers and clients want to work successfully together, but making agreements or payments internationally is complicated.

title: Fair Stake Pool Selection
description: Many sites priorities ranking over many other metrics for pool selection. We provide the community the option of fairer selection.

title: Cardano Analytics Data Hub
description: Data relating to the Cardano ecosystem is granular and scattered, making it difficult to access and use for downstream applications.

title: Zimbabwe Developers for Cardano
description: As blockchain becomes the default tech to solve local problems, lack of competent Cardano devs will become an issue unless addressed now

title: Delegator Dividend Reward System
description: Operators need a simple, scalable method of sharing sales revenue with delegators.

title: C64 Modular Wallet
description: A wallet that provides a sovereign, customized and simplified developers experience by supporting new use cases in the form of addons.

title: StorJ for NFT storage [NFT-MAKER]
description: Almost all of the NFTs on Cardano are currently completely dependent on the IPFS network, we need alternative options.

title: Plutus PAB Typescript SDK
description: Cardano dApp and Smart Contract developers will need an open-source SDK that enables interactions with the Plutus Application Backend.

title: Arweave as NFT storage [NFT-MAKER]
description: Almost all of the NFTs on Cardano are currently completely dependent on the IPFS network, we need alternative options.

title: ETH-Cardano NFT Bridge [NFT-MAKER|
description: NFTs mostly live on one chain, which makes onboarding new users very hard, especially when they already own NFTs on other chains.

title: NEO-Cardano NFT Bridge [NFT-MAKER]
description: NFTs mostly live on one chain, which makes onboarding new users very hard, especially when they already own NFTs on other chains.

title: IOTA-Cardano NFT Bridge [NFT-MAKER]
description: NFTs mostly live on one chain, which makes onboarding new users very hard, especially when they already own NFTs on other chains.

title: True limitations of the Marlowe
description: Find the true limitations of the Marlowe smart contract system such that a developer will know when and where they must use Plutus.

title: Dataset - Token / CNFT Analytics
description: Currently NFT data is disparate and lacking metadata standards, making it hard to query and gain insights from.

title: Cryptocurrency Exchange
description: Most African countries have no cryptocurrency exchange that supports trading in their native currency.

title: Blockchain-Powered forex Market
description: Most African currencies are not listed on the international forex market.

title: Testnet support for API [NFT-MAKER]
description: When onboarding developers to NFT-MAKER PRO, they have to spend real ADA to test the API.

title: Cross-border payment processing
description: Cross-border payments are time-consuming services and they are known for their expensive service fees.

title: Reach POC on Cardano
description: New devs face 3 problems: developer lockout, component consistency, and high cost of correctness when choosing to develop on blockchain

title: Cardano Developer Academy
description: The Cardano ecosystem needs more skilled smart contract developers to develop more dApps, and to reach its full potential.

title: Blace.io: Marketplace Creator
description: As marketplaces are being built, repeat work is being executed, cutting into the overall efficiency of developers.

title: Visual Blockchain Designer/Explorer
description: No tool exists on the Cardano network to visually communicate smart contracts or explore the blockchain

title: Continuous Finance Building Blocks
description: DApp developers want to use financial Smart Contracts in projects, but that requires Plutus engineering expertise, slowing time-to-market.

title: Cardano Wallet Flutter SDK - Fund6
description: Flutter is the fastest growing mobile app developer community but currently there's no Flutter library support in the Cardano ecosystem.

title: Retroactive Project Funding SDK
description: Project Catalyst & SoFi DApps must leverage treasuries while funding innovation. Building robust market mechanisms to do that is difficult.

title: CPU/IOT development for fact data
description:
To reduce the noise to society caused by data whose authenticity cannot be proven  

\-data can be super easily modified and processed by AI-

title: gimbalabs-building network capacity
description: To build something truly new, developers need tools, a learning community, and holistic support in elucidating ideas and fostering teams.

title: gimbalabs - Plutus PBL program
description: Anyone building a dapp on Cardano needs developers to help build their dreams, and there are not enough devs to go around.

title: GMBL-turn devs into blockchain devs
description: There are not enough Cardano blockchain developers to deliver on the tidal wave of work coming our way.

title: Multiverse - dApp Rollback Handler
description: Rollbacks create unnecessary stress on the user's side, degrade UX and make it hard for developers to handle all the edge cases for dApps

title: Dataset - On-Chain Analytics
description: DBSync is the best source of raw on-chain data, but it is highly normalized and hard to analyze or apply machine learning in its raw state.

title: Dart SDK for Blockfrost API
description: Dart developers are missing tools to fully enjoy Blockfrost.io, a service that provides free and public Cardano API to developers.

title: Blockfrost Unity games assets
description: Unity, the game engine, lacks assets to interact with the Cardano blockchain.

title: Blockfrost PAB
description: Plutus Application Backend requires full node to operate.

title: gimbalabs - Dandelion Daemon(s)
description: In order to further develop Dandelion, a distributed network of API services, coordination software for the nodes needs to be developed.

title: Koios - Elastic Cardano Query Layer
description: With the increase in blockchain size, the costs of maintaining query layers are expensive, leading to inconsistent centralized solutions.

title: Localize in Ukrainian and Russian
description: There are many developers in Ukraine, Russia, Eastern Europe and they will be happy to have all necessary information in these languages

title: Prediction Outcome Verification
description: Prediction outcomes for resolving smart contracts often rely on centralized data sources, non-experts & those with conflicting incentives.

title: Open-source ISO Toolkit
description: ISO or ISPO (Initial Stake Pool Offering) is one of the best ways to raise funds, but there aren't any tools to do it efficiently yet.

title: Minswap TypeScript SDK
description: Minswap is one of the leading DEXs on Cardano. Other applications need an easy way to integrate Minswap for swapping tokens.

title: KNuggies Education Platform
description: The availability of guided courses in the Cardano ecosystem needs to be improved to quickly onboard more developers.

title: ADA MakerSpace Bounty Hunters DEVX
description: Even though lots of people need help building things on Cardano, it is still hard for them to find & connect with DEVs to do freelance tasks

title: Dataset - Stake Pool Analytics
description: Full historical stake pool datasets for analysis and machine learning are currently not available through block explorers or existing sites

title: Logosphere - dApp Hackathons
description: Lots of dev time is spent on boilerplate code for off-chain data persistence. Even if a project ships, developing in their ecosystem is hard

title: Contract Labeling & Transparency
description: Functionality of smart-contracts is not knowable to end-users.  Lack of user confidence will limit general adoption.

title: Cardano Data Indexing
description: There is no data indexing on Cardano.

title: Legacy Databases to Blockchain
description: Thousands of legacy applications use traditional databases, need operational integration w/ Cardano for payments & other app-specific goals

title: Holistic Development Case Studies
description: No matter how good tech can be, it's not great if people don't understand how to use it.

title: BEN Learn Cardano Developer Course
description: While there's a lot of general education about Cardano, there is a lack of Developer focused education.

title: Legal resources for developers
description: As the community of Cardano developers grows, there is a pressing need for legal expertise. How can the need be met in an efficient manner?

title: Tutorchain.io - Cardano use case
description: Finding an expert or monetizing your expertise requires centralized vetting services that limit your choices and control your access.

title: Ikigai - UE4/Unity Plugins & Tools
description: Game Developers lack the tooling to integrate decentralized systems like Cardano/Fluree/NFTs into their game or infrastructure

title: Gaming in Cardano For Mass Adoption
description: We are now seeing  acceptance of Blockchain use cases and Gaming is one of the promising use case use of Blockchain.

title: Marketing for Ada Integration Tools
description: Tools to enable Ada payments & custom Cardano integrations into e-commerce and developer applications are not being professionally marketed

title: Heidrun Expansion Upgrades - Part 1
description: Heidrun is an amazing tool to enable custom application integration with Cardano, but the current supported functionality limits app scope

title: Heidrun Expansion Upgrades - Part 2
description: Heidrun is an amazing tool to enable custom application integration with Cardano, but the current supported functionality limits app scope

title: Heidrun Core Management Upgrades
description: Heidrun is an amazing tool to enable custom application integration with Cardano, but the current supported functionality limits management

title: Heidrun Expansion Upgrades - Part 3

title: Treasury for Mini-Proposals
description: Proposers are discouraged to work on small ideas and improvements using the current Project Catalyst funding model

title: People Centred Design = less risk
description: Knowing how to code is not enough. Understanding the experience layer, the intent behind code is vital for user adoption& product market fit

title: No-Code Smart Contracts
description: The power and joy of building Cardano apps is only available to the less than 0.001% of the population familiar with programming

title: Cardano Wallet lib in pure JS(TS)
description: We do not have enough tools for the JS devs. One of the low-level packages is a wallet library. We need a pure JS wallet library for Cardano

title: Bip32Ed25519 pure JS implementation
description: Cardano cryptography libraries are available in Rust & Haskell. There is no easy way to build light wallet functionality for web and mobile

title: Cardanoscan API Service
description: We need serverless backend service and APIs for the developers, without wasting time on infrastructure management.

title: Plutus Integration with Pony Lang
description: Some Cardano-based projects could benefit from the use of an actor model language with similar guarantees as Haskell. Scalability by design.

title: dRISK
description: There are many risks associated with creating blockchain based systems and cryptocurrency.

title: dApp Templates & GUI dApp Modules
description: Learning new code language is a barrier for Dev's, give them the ready-made code & info', how to customise quickly for common use-cases

title: Elm Integration with Plutus
description: Haskell can be difficult to work with for beginners, and Plutus development could benefit from simpler patterns for designing applications.

title: Transaction editor to replace cli
description: cardano-cli is cumbersome as transaction complexity grows. Bash scripts (ugly) provide limited editing and documentation capabilities

title: Bridge between Catalyst and Kaggle
description: There is a dearth of expertise in AI in the catalyst community as well as in the community at large
